name: Hezrou
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; damage from nonmagical weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hezrou makes one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature  it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained  and the hezrou can't bite another target.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc: The hezrou makes a bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits and the hezrou has not swallowed another creature  the target is swallowed and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature has total cover from attacks from outside the hezrou  it is blinded and restrained  and it takes 17 (5d6) ongoing acid damage while swallowed.

actions.name: If a swallowed creature deals 25 or more damage to the hezrou in a single turn, or if the hezrou dies, the hezrou vomits up the creature
Darkness
actions.desc: Magical darkness spreads from a point within 30 feet  filling a 15-foot-radius sphere and spreading around corners. It remains for 1 minute  until the hezrou dismisses it  or until the hezrou uses this ability again. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

special_abilities.name: Chaotic Evil
special_abilities.desc: The hezrou radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
